code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{fetchPuppies}from'../redux/actions/puppyActions';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AvailablePuppies=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{puppies,loading,error}=useSelector(state=>state.puppy);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchPuppies());},[dispatch]);const renderPuppies=()=>{if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error});}return puppies.map(puppy=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border rounded-lg p-4 m-2 bg-gray-800 text-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:puppy.image,alt:puppy.name,className:"w-full h-48 object-cover rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold",children:puppy.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Age: ",puppy.age," months"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Gender: ",puppy.gender]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Health Details: ",puppy.healthDetails]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Adoption Price: $",puppy.adoptionPrice]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mt-2 bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Adopt Me"})]},puppy._id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center text-white mb-4",children:"Available Puppies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap justify-center",children:renderPuppies()})]});};export default AvailablePuppies;
